# Section

```.jsx
<Section
    bg='hotpink'
    heading="Heading"
    subhead="Subhead">
    Content
</Section>
```

Extends: [Flex](https://jxnblk.com/rebass/components/Flex)

| prop     | default | type   |
| -------- | ------- | ------ |
| heading  |         | string |
| subhead  |         | string |
| children |         | any    |
